mapper.select: SELECT m.member_no, m.email, m.password, m.name, m.profile_name, m.profile_path, p.project_no, p.project_title, p.project_description, p.project_status, p.color, pm.member_position FROM member m JOIN project_member pm ON m.member_no = pm.member_no JOIN project p ON pm.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.project_no = #{p.project_no}
